## IGeometryAccessor interface

Basic interface for geometry accessors.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IGeometryAccessor 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getCount()](./harp-mapview.igeometryaccessor.getcount.md) | Get the number of primitives (vertices of triangles). |
|  [setRange(start, end)](./harp-mapview.igeometryaccessor.setrange.md) | Set range of primitives in this object related to one or more buffers. |
